recipesJson.name: Got Flakes?
recipesJson.author: DiscipleVapor
recipesJson.description: This is a bowl of frosted flakes cereal doused in milk.  The super sweet bumps the sugary note while the meringue and vienna cream layers and accentuates the milk.  It is descent SNV but really pops after 3-5 days steep.  After a week it will fully mature.
